summary: Frontend implements a branded minimalist post list with header and footer, and a warm earth-tone theme. Backend adds basic post creation and retrieval, but the backend data model, validation, ordering, and upgrade persistence required by REQ-1 are not implemented. Several unrequested features (delete endpoint, auth plumbing, extra footer attribution) were added.

missing_requirements.requirement: Persistent BlogPost type with at least id, title, content, createdAt; create endpoint rejects empty title/content; list endpoint returns newest-first; posts survive canister upgrades via stable storage.
missing_requirements.reason: Backend Post type lacks id and createdAt; create endpoint does not reject empty strings; getPosts returns map values without sorting; storage is an in-memory Map with no stable variables or preupgrade/postupgrade hooks, so it will not persist across upgrades.

missing_requirements.requirement: Homepage renders posts showing title and content (and created date if available) and updates when new posts are created.
missing_requirements.reason: Frontend PostFeed renders title and content only (no date). Also, there is no mechanism shown to refresh the list when new posts are created (refetchOnWindowFocus is disabled, and no polling/invalidation tied to post creation is present).

hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request a delete endpoint (only create and list).

hallucinated_features.description: Backend getPost(title) endpoint (fetch single post by title).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only requires a query endpoint to list posts for the frontend; single-post fetch by title is not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication/provider hooks and actor creation logic tied to identity.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly says 'do not add auth unless explicitly requested'; adding II login framework is extra and not required to meet the blog display/create endpoint requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer attribution/link to caffeine.ai and heart icon.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-3 only asks for brand name plus an 'All rights reserved' notice; the additional attribution content is not requested.
